document.full_text: british actress elisabeth sladen, who starred in the popular "doctor who" sci-fi series and the spin-off show "the sarah jane adventures," has died aged 63, the bbc said on tuesday.
document.title: doctor who actress elisabeth sladen dies at 63
lines_and_colors: british actress elisabeth sladen, who starred in the popular "doctor who" sci-fi series and the spin-off show "the sarah jane adventures," has died aged 63, the bbc said on tuesday.
